item.title: Four of the Apocalypse
item.description: Four of the Apocalypse is a 1975 Italian spaghetti western film directed by Lucio Fulci and starring Fabio Testi, Tomas Milian and Michael J. Pollard.

item.title: Los Amigos
item.description: Deaf Smith & Johnny Ears, also known as Los Amigos, is a 1973 Spaghetti Western film starring Anthony Quinn and Franco Nero in 1973. The film is loosely based on the life of Deaf Smith, with direction of Paolo Cavara.

item.title: A Reason to Live, a Reason to Die
item.description: A Reason to Live, a Reason to Die is a 1972 Technicolor Italian spaghetti western movie starring James Coburn, Bud Spencer and Telly Savalas.

item.title: Find a Place to Die
item.description: Find a Place to Die (1968) is a spaghetti western starring Jeffrey Hunter and Pascale Petit. It was co-written and directed by Giuliano Carnimeo with sequences directed by Hugo Fregonese who also produced the film.
